banner.description-line-1: GP4Tech is a community that aims to involve more women in the area of technology
banner.description-line-2: Come and meet us at our next event

form.subscription-agreement: I agree to receive news, stories and ideas for action from GP4Tech.

who.title: Who are we?
who.description: Girl Power for Technology (GP4Tech) is an initiative of the Jala family, which encourages, develops and motivates the participation of women in technology, opening spaces for training, personal development, and skills necessary for the field. Our vision is to encourage the inclusion and professional development of women in technology at the Bolivian level.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Girl Power for Technology it's a Jalasoft initiative. It's purpose it's to encourage, develop, and motivate the participation of women in technology. By starting training opportunities for personal development and needed abilities in the field.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To encourage the inclusion of professional development of Bolivian women looking to grow in technology.

who-did-this.title: Who did this?
who-did-this.description: We are a talented group of people who enjoys eating, laughing and creating software. We code, we test and we make ideas come to life. Meet the people behind the curtain. Meet our web team.

contact-us.title: Let's code a better world!
contact-us.description: Amazing things happen when we get together. GP4Tech is an internal community withing Jalasoft whose members make things happen! Do you have questions? Send us a message we will be more than happy to hear from you.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.description: The following public transportation lines can leave you near Jalasoft's facilities: 120, 230, A, Z12, 101, 110, 209

contact-us.subject: Subject

events.title: Events and Activities
events.description: Our main ally is education, that's why we have been searching ways to share our knowledge through informative talks, workshops, training, and different types of events and activities that promote the inclusion of women and give us the necessary visibility to spread hope and ambition among the young people that are going through the age of making a career choice. We want to make a change in the world, and we have the talent and hope to make it.

donate.beneficiary-name: Beneficiary Name: Helen Paola Tamayo Arce
donate.description: We are an initiative that works voluntarily. Since our activities focus on college students, we provide mostly free events, making them accessible to everyone. In case you can give us a hand to carry these events, we appreciate it! Remember that any help is welcome.
donate.note1: *** Take into account the following characteristics for the reception of payments through the BANCO DO BRASIL:
donate.note2: 1. Receipt of business-to-business or business-to-person payments of the COMMERCIAL type.
donate.note3: 2. No payments and/or person-to-person transfers shall be made for any reason.
donate.subtitle: Thank you for considering making a donation to GP4Tech.
donate.title: Make a donation
